entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
